name: NBCNews
text:
RT @NBCNightlyNews: Get your questions answered about the Covid-19 vaccine.
 
Join us tomorrow at 4pm ET on https://t.co/jANd2PuTsP for a live Q&A with @DrJohnTorres. https://t.co/2xGZRinyMF

name: NBCNews
text: Mastercard and Visa are investigating their business relationship with Pornhub after allegations that the popular porn site is hosting child sexual abuse content. https://t.co/bkbmKG6Abw

name: NBCNews
text: The artistic worth of Bob Dylan's catalog — newly acquired by Universal Music Group — is hard to overstate. But the value of Dylan's songwriting oeuvre is not just a matter of his contributions to culture, according to music industry experts. https://t.co/VJk1BgzisP

name: NBCNews
text: The U.S. Supreme Court has declined to take up an appeal from Oregon parents who want transgender students in their school district to use locker rooms and bathrooms based on their sex assigned at birth. https://t.co/Yp3iTTOdcR

name: NBCNews
text: RT @gabegutierrez: In a rare move, the Ohio Attorney General has refused the request of Columbus police to take over the investigation into the shooting death of #CaseyGoodson. Full statement below: https://t.co/9DthBEfssPIn a rare move, the Ohio Attorney General has refused the request of Columbus police to take over the investigation… https://t.co/SKb8OsKu51
